Job Description: As a Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for creating user-facing features for web applications. You will work closely with UX/UI designers to implement modern designs and ensure a smooth user experience. Your main focus will be on writing clean and efficient code using technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (React, Angular, or Vue). You should have a solid understanding of cross-browser compatibility, responsive design, and web performance optimization.

The System Engineer will design, implement, and maintain complex IT systems and infrastructure. You will work on managing servers, storage, and networks, ensuring all systems are highly available and secure. In this role, you will collaborate with software development teams to optimize system performance and provide support for hardware and software configuration. Strong knowledge of cloud services, virtualization, and automation tools is essential.

As a DevOps Engineer, your role will involve automating and optimizing processes to support continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. You will work closely with development and operations teams to ensure seamless development workflows and maintain robust production systems. Familiarity with tools like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and Terraform is required, along with experience in cloud computing (AWS, Azure, GCP) and infrastructure-as-code practices.
